name: Auni at the Alex Vallauri Artistic Residency/Auni na Residência Artística Alex Vallauri
description: GIF made with 3 authorial photos. I was sitting at my desk and holding some "Extra-Mini Energy Blocks" sculptures from the "Energy Blocks" series that won at the same year (2018) in the 36th. Salon of Plastic Arts of Rio Claro - São Paulo/Brazil, the category "Contemporary" with silver medal. Alex Vallauri Residency - National Arts Foundation/FUNARTE
